name: pocket sherman
description:
is my 5° game, maked for a client, the goal of this game is to take care of a simple dog like "pou the game" or my game "classic pocket equine"

contents:

- 3 minigames

- custom colors for the dog

- 9 maps and 40 hats to buy (costs 100 coins)

- clean, feed, make sleep your dog

the game is only spanish (by the client), and no sound by my hardware

a little donation is a big help n.n

game by me, supported by "stuke entertaiment"

created with godot engine and graphicsgale
